message.name: SYS_STATUS
message.description: Extended system status with additional timestamp and network rate information for PX4
message.field: Unix timestamp (microseconds since UNIX epoch)
Timestamp (milliseconds since system boot)
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors are present. Value of 0: not present. Value of 1: present.
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors are enabled: Value of 0: not enabled. Value of 1: enabled.
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors have an error (or are operational). Value of 0: error. Value of 1: healthy.
Maximum usage in percent of the mainloop time. Values: [0-1000] - should always be below 1000
Battery voltage, UINT16_MAX: Voltage not sent by autopilot
Battery current, -1: Current not sent by autopilot
Battery energy remaining, -1: Battery remaining energy not sent by autopilot
Communication drop rate
Communication errors
Transmit rate (bytes per second)
Receive rate (bytes per second)
Autopilot-specific errors
Autopilot-specific errors
Autopilot-specific errors
Autopilot-specific errors
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors are present. Value of 0: not present. Value of 1: present.
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors are enabled: Value of 0: not enabled. Value of 1: enabled.
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors have an error (or are operational). Value of 0: error. Value of 1: healthy.

message.name: GNSS_STATUS
message.description: GNSS sensor system status with GPS positioning information for PX4
message.field: Unix timestamp (microseconds since UNIX epoch, 1.1.1970 or later)
GPS fix type
Latitude (WGS84, EGM96 ellipsoid)
Longitude (WGS84, EGM96 ellipsoid)
Altitude (MSL). Positive for up. Note: If altitude is provided by GPS, it uses WGS84 ellipsoid, not MSL altitude.
GPS HDOP horizontal dilution of position (unitless * 100). If unknown, set to UINT16_MAX
GPS VDOP vertical dilution of position (unitless * 100). If unknown, set to UINT16_MAX
GPS ground speed
Number of satellites visible. If unknown, set to UINT8_MAX
